alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:07PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central White Pine County through 530 PM PDT... At 506 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ely, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ely, Ruth, McGill, Ely Airport, Robinson Summit, and Cave Lake State Park, US-50 and US-6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
